title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see climbing stairs in a dream and interpret long or broken stairs according to the correct interpretations, because it is known that stairs are a means of climbing in all homes, so there is no home in which there is no home. The ladder is a way to reach the upper floors, but nowadays there are escalators that have become a means of movement, but what is the meaning of seeing stairs in a dream? Interpretation of the dream of seeing stairs climbing in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and seeing stairs in a dream indicates achieving success and excellence in the field of study Or work, achieving a prominent position, as well as promotion at work and reaching the highest ranks. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs by Ibn Sirin: To see stairs that you climb easily in a dream without effort, seeing them indicates success in study and work. Climbing stairs in a dream indicates recovery. From illness. Likewise, dreaming that one was climbing the stairs with difficulty in a dream indicates the difficulties and obstacles that the dreamer faces in life. As for the interpretation of seeing him climbing the stairs in a dream with a specific person he knows, his dream is a sign of success. See also: Interpretation Dreaming of seeing stairs in a dream for single people. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs in Nabulsi: Interpretation of climbing stairs in a dream shows the high status of the pioneer among the people. Seeing climbing stairs in a traveler’s dream is evidence of his return from travel. Interpretation of seeing the president descending the stairs in a dream indicates his dismissal from his position. Interpretation Dream of climbing stairs for a bowling woman: Seeing a woman climbing the stairs in a dream indicates her good behavior. Seeing a girl climbing the bowl ladder also indicates that she will get married soon. Interpretation of falling stairs for single people is a sign of emotional shock. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an elevator in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Climbing the stairs for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing a married woman climbing the stairs symbolizes marital happiness and stability in her life. Likewise, seeing her going down the stairs could symbolize the problems that led to her separation from her husband. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the stairs for a pregnant woman: Seeing a ladder for a pregnant woman in a dream It symbolizes her birth. The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman quickly climbing a ladder in a dream is an indication of the ease of birth. A dream of climbing stairs for a pregnant woman who is experiencing difficulties is a sign of difficulty giving birth. Also, a dream of a long staircase for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a child. As for a pregnant woman seeing a small staircase in a dream, this indicates the birth of a woman. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sweeper in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs for a man:

title: Interpretation of dreams of many large scorpions for single women with different interpretations

preview.html: Scorpions are poisonous reptiles that live mostly in the desert, and seeing them in a dream is one of the disturbing visions that carry many connotations, so we will learn about the interpretation of a dream of many scorpions in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of many scorpions: Seeing many scorpions in a dream indicates enemies who are jealous of him and will reveal About their true nature and he must be careful, and that person did that and God knows best. And if the fortuneteller sees that he set fire to the scorpions and part of them died and another part escaped, then the vision indicates that he will be harmed. Ash fire, here the vision is not good and symbolizes for the dreamer eating the orphan’s money. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing many and huge scorpions in a dream is due to the large number of enemies and deceivers in the dreamer’s life, whether male or female. Killing a scorpion is a sign of victory over the enemy, and burning and killing scorpions is a good thing for the fortuneteller. . As for roasting scorpions and eating them, they symbolize the consumption of forbidden money or bringing money into the house from illicit trade. Whoever sees scorpions stinging people in front of him and does not seek to save them, this is evidence of the death of an enemy of his. However, if he sees someone transformed into a scorpion, the vision here warns. from him. A great misfortune or trouble, and God knows best, and torturing scorpions and burning them in a married man’s dream is a sign of his imminent victory over his enemies. Seeing yourself killing black scorpions in a dream and burning them is a sign of getting rid of problems and positive changes in the fortuneteller’s life, and it indicates his betrayal of the people closest to him. And if The dreamer saw that he swallowed many scorpions, this indicates the revelation of a big secret in his life that he had been hiding for a while, and seeing many scorpions in the house without killing them and them escaping is evidence of their deception. The fortuneteller by those around him, and whoever sees a lot of scorpions in the desert and tries to escape from them, but is stung by the blood that comes out is a sign of betrayal and the loss of someone close to him. And whoever sees scorpions everywhere in the house and tries to set fire to them, this is evidence of his illness and the loss of money, but God He will heal him and compensate him with goodness in the single man’s dream, as this indicates his emotional betrayal by the girl he is in a relationship with. If the scorpions in the dreamer’s dream turn from black to white, this is evidence that in reality there are people who show him love but they hate him. If the fortuneteller is married and sees the scorpions burning, turning them into People in a dream. Laughter symbolizes betrayal. An abundance of yellow scorpions is an indication of certain health problems, and killing scorpions and shedding their blood represents purity, chastity, and a good reputation, especially if the fortuneteller is single. In the case of fraud by a trusted friend. In the event that the fortuneteller becomes ill and sees that the scorpion stings him and bleeds profusely and is killed by someone other than him, this is evidence that the fortuneteller will soon recover from the illness. If a married woman sees that she is walking in the desert and sees scorpions, large and small, this indicates religion. If scorpions hit her husband, this indicates her fear of a certain thing. People who declare debts. Interpretation of a dream of many scorpions for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees scorpions

title: Interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream and dreaming of ascending to heaven

preview.html: Seeing the sky in a dream symbolizes those in power and those around them, and a dream of the sky may refer to the house or the roof of the house. This indicates that the sky in a dream is generally one of the visions promising the disappearance of problems and difficulties if it is clear blue, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that he saw heaven in a dream with the ruler and his humility because he is above creation, and the dream of the sky can show the king’s palace and his money, In other interpretations, the sky in a dream shows the roof of a house, because Almighty God called the sky a preserved roof, and the dream appears as a clear sky. The desire for something great is not achieved by the dreamer, so do not miss it. Whoever sees that he is looking at the sky in a dream, he will fulfill his desire and satisfy his desires, and looking at the sky from sunrise in a dream indicates ease of travel. Seeing the sky falling in a dream means the death of the sultan if he is sick. It may indicate A dream about the sky falling to earth indicates the return of a traveler or an absent person to this earth, and whoever sees that the sky has fallen on him in a dream, this is evidence that the roof of his house has fallen on him. Ibn Sirin interpreted the sky in a dream as a ministry because it contains the moon and the moon in the vision of a minister, Seeing the second heaven in a dream indicates knowledge, literature, acumen, and prestige. Whoever sees that he is in the fifth heaven in a dream acquires art and conquers his enemies, and dreaming of the sixth heaven indicates achieving goodness in buying and selling, and the seventh heaven in the dream symbolizes property and real estate, and whoever sees that he is above the sky. The seventh in a dream gains great height, but perishes. Hearing a voice from the sky in a dream means a warning and a warning to avoid sins. Dreaming of hearing an explosion in the sky indicates general sadness and drought. Seeing clouds in the sky in a dream indicates a lot of goodness and fertility, and whoever sees smoke in the sky in A dream is being punished by a sultan or a ruler, and God knows best. Interpretation of the sky in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says: “The sky in a dream indicates a country and a fortress.” It can indicate the wife, the house, and the family, and the vision of looking at the sky in a dream indicates a vow, according to the Almighty’s saying: “And the sky that loves you “And “Heaven and the Absolute.” And the farmer because it indicates the growth of plants and fruits. The sky in a dream indicates Hajj if the dream is during the holy months, and perhaps the sky indicates height and elevation. Wheat falling from the sky in a dream indicates the acquisition of blessed, lawful sustenance. Likewise, whoever sees honey and mistletoe descending from the sky in a dream, this is evidence that he has obtained a lot of sustenance and beneficial knowledge, and every beneficial thing that descends from the sky indicates that, and the ascension of one of the beneficial ones into the sky. In a dream, there is evidence of rising prices. The descent of snakes or snakes from the sky in a dream is evidence of worries and anxiety, and also the descent of scorpions from the sky in a dream is evidence of pests and diseases, and the rise of snakes and harmful things in a dream. Evidence of removing injustice or destroying the unbelievers. Climbing the sky in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: “The dream of ascending to heaven by a ladder or ladder indicates attaining a high position.”

Evidence of removing injustice or destroying the unbelievers. Climbing the sky in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: “The dream of ascending to heaven by a ladder or ladder indicates attaining a high position.”

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lamp in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing a lamp in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the dreams that shows the great goodness of its owner. The bulbul is one of the birds that has a very sweet voice. Ears are happy to hear it, hearts explain it, and souls are optimistic about it. Let us find out now through this article in the encyclopedia about the interpretation of seeing a bulbul in a dream. As many dream interpretation scholars have mentioned, about the different situations you can be in, so follow us. Interpretation of bulbul in a dream by Ibn Sirin The famous dream scientist and great translator and scholar Ibn Sirin explains that seeing an onion in a dream is a sign of following an extensive diet or having a good boy with His family. It is also an indication that the dreamer enjoys wealth and easy status. Interpretation of a lamp in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is holding an onion in her hand, this is a sign that she has a sweet voice and she must use it correctly and use it to master the Holy Qur’an. Her dream may be a sign On her ability to realize some dreams and desires that she has always dreamed of in reality. This dream may also predict that she will soon receive a lot of money, either from work or from inheritance. If an unmarried woman finds the lamp locked in a cage or is unable to sing, then This vision never bodes well, as she is exposed to many difficult problems and crises and must be careful. Interpretation of a light bulb in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees red lights in her dream, this is good news for pregnancy. But if he picks up a light bulb in a dream, this is evidence that he has An excellent position at work or among people. Although the nightingale in a dream is considered a sign of kindness, in a married woman’s dream, it is never a sign of kindness. Because it indicates the presence of some haters and envious people who mention her in her absence and she must be careful. Interpretation of the lamp In a man’s dream: A bulb in a man’s dream could be good news that he will obtain an important position at work or will receive very abundant money. Also, this dream may be evidence that he will have a sweet voice that he should use for his benefit and benefit, such as reciting the Holy Qur’an and learning the rules of Toning. But if he finds that he is trapping the bulb in a wound, this is evidence that he will be exposed to worries, sadness, and problems that he will have great difficulty getting rid of. Perhaps trapping the bulb in a dream is evidence of entering prison in reality or losing a person dear to the dreamer’s heart, God forbid. Interpretation of a bulbul in a dream by Al-NabulsiAl-Nabulsi confirms the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, where he sees that seeing a bulbul in a dream is a sign of the birth of good offspring, characterized by a sweet voice and a gentle tongue. Also, seeing a bulbul in a dream is interpreted as evidence of obtaining abundant money from trade or inheritance. As for the presence of a number A large number of bulbs that sing on trees is a sign of feeding a large number of righteous children, God willing. Interpretation of Bulbul in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation does not differ from the interpretation of both Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. He believes that the nightingale is a sign

title: Interpretation of breastfeeding a child in a dream: Seeing breastfeeding in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Breastfeeding a dream for a married woman from an unmarried woman Breastfeeding a child by Ibn Sirin Breastfeeding a male child Breastfeeding a female Breastfeeding a non-child The meaning of breastfeeding a child in a dream For an unmarried girl, breastfeeding a child is a blessing, goodness, honesty, and great happiness. Ibn Sirin and some interpret it to mean that the unmarried woman has a marriage soon, or that she will fulfill a desire and wants to fulfill it and hopes for her life outside of marriage, or that she will give birth after marriage. Her marriage will have a wonderful relationship with a good husband. Many interpreters say that it is a trust that she gets from her parents and those around her, and for a girl who is devoted to her religion, this is good for herself, morals and religion, and the happiness that she will achieve in her life. She unintentionally nurses him in a dream. If the dream is true, then the dream indicates food that will come to you or a job that will be provided to you. Seeing a married woman breastfeeding her children. As for a married woman, if she sees that she is breastfeeding a small child, male or female, with love, tenderness, and joy, then she will become pregnant in Her stomach, and gives birth to a child of the same sex and forms that. She saw in her dream. As for seeing her breasts filled with a lot of milk or formula and increasing in size, whether she is married, pregnant, single, or even a man, this is good and happiness comes at a difficult time. Interpretation of breastfeeding a child or a pregnant woman. And when a pregnant woman sees her breastfeeding her son who is still in her stomach, it is as if she had given birth to him. This indicates that her due date is near, if it is in the last or seventh month, and if so. In the first three months, this shows that what is in her womb of the fetus will be a reason for its nourishment or will be of great importance in its old age. But if the pregnant woman breastfeeds an adult man or a young man who has passed the age of weaning and she knows her, then this is an affliction or illness for the young one, and for the elderly person there will be imprisonment or distress, sadness and poverty. And suffering in his life. life. If a man dreams that he has breasts while he is breastfeeding, this means comfort and happiness or wealth and money. For sick men and women, this is healing and wellness and may indicate repentance from a sinful act or salvation for those suffering from grief, anxiety, and sadness. The interpretation of nursing an elderly person in a dream will always lead to sadness, misfortunes, anxiety, or loss. The meaning of breastfeeding a child in a dream YouTube

For sick men and women, this is healing and wellness and may indicate repentance from a sinful act or salvation for those suffering from grief, anxiety, and sadness. title: Interpretation of watermelon seeds in a dream: seeing eating watermelon in a dream

preview.html: We offer you black seeds with sunflower seeds, eating pumpkin seeds, for the girl, for the single woman, for married people, for the pregnant woman, love of sophistication, seeing watermelon seeds. Interpretation of watermelon seeds in a dream. When you see watermelon seeds, pick them up, or eat them for males and females. The green watermelon seed indicates that the boy is of great weight. Regarding his stature, if the seed is finer, it is better in its meaning for the fortuneteller. If the color of the watermelon or its seeds is yellow, it indicates the fortuneteller’s illness and illness, especially if he eats it. If the color of the seeds is black, it means fewer diseases and less damage. If the color of the watermelon itself is yellow and the person sees its seeds, This is the same sign as the previous yellow seeds. Yellow watermelon and seeing its seeds is a sign of money or the birth of a girl. Interpretation of watermelon in a dream - YouTube
preview.text: We offer you black seeds with sunflower seeds, eating pumpkin seeds, for the girl, for the single woman, for married people, for the pregnant woman, love of sophistication, seeing watermelon seeds. Interpretation of watermelon seeds in a dream. When you see watermelon seeds, pick them up, or eat them for males and females. The green watermelon seed indicates that the boy is of great weight. If the color of the watermelon or its seeds is yellow, it indicates the fortuneteller’s illness and illness, especially if he eats it. If the color of the seeds is black, it means fewer diseases and less damage. If the color of the watermelon itself is yellow and the person sees its seeds, This is the same sign as the previous yellow seeds. Yellow watermelon and seeing its seeds is a sign of money or the birth of a girl. Interpretation of watermelon in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of the letter Waw in a dream according to Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq

The pile of dreams of Imam al-Sadiq. Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq mentioned that seeing the pile in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate a lot of goodness that the dreamer is blessed with, and perhaps it is news of the abundance of wealth and blessings and the abundance of God’s grace. On the dreamer, and God knows best. Dreaming of Imam al-Sadiq on the ankle. The stake is a symbol of strength and stubbornness. As for seeing fig leaves, this portends exposure to worries, problems, suffering, and unpleasant events. God knows best. A tumor in a dream about Imam al-Sadiq. A tumor is one of the symbols that foretells unpleasant events and exposure to severe suffering and distress in general. Also, seeing a tumor in a vein is one of the most undesirable symbols that portends the dreamer’s imminent death, God forbid. A dream about Imam al-Sadiq’s pillow. title: Learn the interpretation of seeing and hearing dogs barking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dogs barking in a dreamDogs are animals that many seek to own, and it is the meaning of faith and love, but many people wonder about the interpretation of seeing them in a dream, as in the case of seeing a dog in a dream, the feeling is to create panic and fear, especially if it is a predator in the dream or As soon as many dream interpretation scholars have obtained many interpretations about seeing a dog in a dream, which we have conveyed to you through the following lines. Everything you do not know about the interpretations of seeing a dog in a dreamInterpretation of dogs barking in a dreamWhen a group of them seems to be barking loudly and loudly, this An indication that there are many hypocrites and corrupt people around the dreamer. If he sees only one, and he is very fierce, and shouts at him, this is a sign that he will face some problems and crises in his life in the future. The Dream Interpretation section on an Egyptian website includes thousands of explanations that you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about dogs barking and if If he sees him looking at him in the face and barking loudly, this is evidence that he will receive many bad words that he does not want to hear, and that the words will be from an imposter, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The best. And if he sees a lot of barking dogs around him, this indicates that the dreamer seeks to do many things that are not beneficial to him. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream? The sound of dogs barking in a dream. If he approaches him and barks louder, this indicates the presence of some enemies. They conspire against him, and if he confronts him, this indicates that his matter will be exposed by these enemies, and if he tears his clothes, this is a sign of that. It means that someone is talking bad about him behind his back. Interpretation of a dog barking in a dream for a single woman. As for seeing this vision in an unmarried girl’s dream, it is one of the unwanted dreams and indicates the presence of a person in her life who seeks to harm her or that he is trying to establish an illegal relationship with her, and God knows best. She must be very careful about this. What are the signs of seeing dogs in a dream for a single woman, according to leading scholars? Seeing a dog in a dream for a single woman and walking beside her, but when she sees that she is walking beside her, and is happy about that, or walking behind her, this is a sign that she will get a good husband. It will be a support for her in her life and you will get married soon. I dreamed that dogs were attacking me. If she saw a large group of them gathering around her, and their voices getting louder, this means that she feels comfortable, safe, and secure in her married life, and it is one of the visions that emerge from a woman’s feeling of inner turmoil. And loss of confidence, and God - Ali - is Most High and Most Knowing. What is the interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream? To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars.

title: Interpretation of the color green in a dream

preview.html: This also applies to the world of dreams, so let us delve into the different interpretations about this color in a dream depending on the social situation. Interpretation of the color green in a dream Ibn Sirin, a scholar who specializes in dream interpretation, says that the green color in general, when it appears in a dream, indicates one of The following matters: Wealth: This color comes to alert the fortuneteller that the coming period is full of goodness and blessings, perhaps abundant money from an inheritance, a profitable trade, or a good job. Excellence: The green color can herald students in different stages of success in the current stage and obtaining the required grades. Or the beginning of excellence for employees and the upcoming promotion. Death of anxiety: The dreamer’s condition changes for the better as the worries and problems that bother him end. Religiosity: The dreamer who wears green shoes in a dream indicates that he follows the religious method in all aspects of life. See also: Interpretation of dreams with green lemons. Seeing the color green In the dream of a single woman, the opinion of Al-Nabulsi, who is also the most prominent dream interpretation scholar, indicates that the green color, when an unmarried girl sees it, portends one of the following things to her: Marriage: The green color, in its different colors, from calm to dark, portends to the girl that she will soon have a date. With a life partner who has good qualities, especially generosity. Meeting a lover: In the event that the girl has feelings for someone, this dream indicates that she will marry this lover soon. Good things: The green color indicates that the current year is the year of the girl’s transformation. Transition From a comfortable life to a comfortable life where you enjoy a lot of money. Wellness: The green color in a dream indicates that an unmarried girl will recover. This is in the event that she is afflicted with a period full of diseases and health problems. Aspirations: The appearance of a green bag in a girl’s dream indicates how close she is to achieving Her various aspirations. Seeing the color green in a dream for a married woman. We address the married woman and quote from the sayings of Imam Al-Sadiq. The green color in the dream indicates that the married woman is approaching a period in which she will enjoy one of the following things: Stability: The green color foretells for the married woman that the coming period will be rich in stability. This is on an emotional as well as financial scale. Calm: The green color indicates that serenity will surround married life. Because he will get rid of various sorrows forever, he will survive them and restore psychological comfort. Positive change: The green color indicates a positive change that will make the married woman happy. Such as moving To another house that suits her family or to buy a modern car. Pregnancy: If a married woman suffers from delayed pregnancy, the green color foretells the appearance of the miracle of pregnancy for her in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about green color for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman fears the fulfillment of the events indicated by her dreams, as a type From fear for the pregnancy and the health of the fetus. Below are details about the interpretation of the color green in a dream for a pregnant woman: Safety of pregnancy: The green color is reassuring

title: Interpretation of a dream about my father playing with me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my father playing with me in a dream. We will then learn the interpretation of a dream about my father playing with me in a dream, and is it good or bad, all this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about my father playing with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father playing with me in a dream. If the dreamer sees the father, he can express praiseworthy things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if the dreamer sees the father in a dream, it may portend the coming of good things, and God knows everything that is not seen. When you see a father He guides his son, as this may lead to his son being able to achieve his goals, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her father leading her, this means goodness, happiness, and success, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my father calling me in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my father calling me in a dream can indicate things It is good, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees a father praying in a dream, he can express justice and piety, God willing. In the event that an unmarried girl sees a father praying for her, this may lead to truth and justice, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees a father calling her in a dream, This may mean that she honors her father, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off my father’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off my father’s hand in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a severed hand can lead to trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a severed hand in a dream, this may indicate fears, and God knows best. When a dreamer sees a severed hand in a dream, it may be a sign of some problems and worries. And God Most High knows best. The interpretation of the dream of my father who lost his mind in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of my father who lost his mind in a dream, and we did not find specific interpretations to see that. If the dreamer dreams that he is losing his mind, this may lead to exaggeration and exaggeration, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself losing her mind in a dream, this may represent Financial problems and crises, and God knows all that we have not seen. If a young man sees madness, it may foretell financial problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my father taking a bath in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father taking a bath in a dream may lead to repentance for sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her father taking a bath in a dream In a dream, this may be a sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees her father bathing in a dream, this may indicate the father’s closeness to God and that God has all knowledge. If a single young man dreams of his father bathing, this may be a sign of a new beginning, God willing. GodInterpretation of dreams of my father giving me chocolate in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of my father giving me chocolate in a dream To see him offering chocolate can mean goodness and happiness, God willing. In the event that the dreamer sees himself offering chocolate, it may mean that he will get rid of stress, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees someone giving chocolate in In a dream, this may indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees someone giving her chocolate in a dream, this may be a sign of love.
